member.name: T:Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.AzureOpenAI.AzureClientCore
member.summary: Base class for AI clients that provides common functionality for interacting with Azure OpenAI services.
Base class for AI clients that provides common functionality for interacting with Azure OpenAI services.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.AzureOpenAI.AzureClientCore.GetResponseModalities(Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.OpenAI.OpenAIPromptExecutionSettings)
member.summary: Gets the response modalities from the execution settings.
member.returns: The response modalities as a flags enum.

member.name: M:Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.AzureOpenAI.AzureClientCore.GetAudioOptions(Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.OpenAI.OpenAIPromptExecutionSettings)
member.summary: Gets the audio options from the execution settings.
member.returns: The audio options as a object.

member.name: T:Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.AzureOpenAI.AzureOpenAIPromptExecutionSettings
member.summary: Execution settings for an AzureOpenAI completion request.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.AzureOpenAI.AzureOpenAIPromptExecutionSettings.UserSecurityContext
member.summary: Get/Set the user security context which contains several parameters that describe the AI application itself, and the end user that interacts with the AI application. These fields assist your security operations teams to investigate and mitigate security incidents by providing a comprehensive approach to protecting your AI applications. Learn more about protecting AI applications using Microsoft Defender for Cloud.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.AzureOpenAI.AzureOpenAIPromptExecutionSettings.SetNewMaxCompletionTokensEnabled
member.summary: Enabling this property will enforce the new max_completion_tokens parameter to be send the Azure OpenAI API.
member.remarks:
This setting is temporary and flags the underlying Azure SDK to use the new max_completion_tokens parameter using the
SetNewMaxCompletionTokensPropertyEnabled extension.

member.name: P:Microsoft.SemanticKernel.Connectors.AzureOpenAI.AzureOpenAIPromptExecutionSettings.AzureChatDataSource
member.summary: An abstraction of additional settings for chat completion, see https://learn.microsoft.com/en-us/dotnet/api/azure.ai.openai.azurechatextensionsoptions. This property is compatible only with Azure OpenAI.

member.summary: Create a new settings object with the values from another settings object.

member.summary: Create a new settings object with the values from another settings object.
